sentence: Another Trump favorite, former football star Herschel Walker, is all but certain to win the GOP Senate primary in Georgia on Tuesday.
author: Niall Stanage
title: The Memo: Trump no longer holds MAGA movement in his palm

sentence: There are still kids who will wear Herschel Walkers football jerseys some 40 years after he played for the University of Georgia.
title: Herschel Walker's ties to veterans program face scrutiny
